result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 1:30 pm. 
INCLUDES: 22CF787 & 22CM576.

Deft appears in person, pro se.
Date and time set for review re: public defender representation prior to preliminary hearing. 
Court notes SPD is awaiting verification from deft. to determine eligibility. Deft. has sent verification to PD.
Prelim set for 07/11/2022 to remain on calendar at this time. 
Review set for 07/08/2022 at 1:00 pm in Courtroom B. 

Adj: 1:33 pm.

INCLUDES 22CM576 & 22CF787.  No contact with victim(s):  J.R.G. and R.A.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  Police escort to retrieve personal property from the residence - Wausau PD.  Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license.  Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (2) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk Micki. 
Case called: 3:25p.m.
INCLUDES 22CM576 and 22CF787

State appears by DDA Molly Lawrence for ADA Rory McGarry.  Defendant appears in person in custody from the MCJ, with Attorney Heather Roehr in person.

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Prelim Time Limits Preserved.
PLEA: NOT GUILTY on Misd.

COURT ORDERS: $1,000.00 signature bond in both files

CONDITIONS: 
No contact with victim(s): J.R.G. and R.A.
Police escort to retrieve personal property from the residence - Wausau PD. 
Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
No driving without valid DL. 
Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 2 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

Dates:
RH: 7/6/22 at 1:00 p.m. Ct. Rm. B.
